name: S.P.A.C.E!
description:
For the Staffordshire University Games Jam.

You play as Special Phorces: Astrosider, and you have 5 minutes to take as many alien invaders with you before you ship supposedly explodes (not pictured).

This turn based strategy game will have you deciding whether to move, dodging incoming damage and moving into a better position, or to shoot, killing...enemies.

Or you can use grenades to decimate both the enemies AND the ship.

Made by the Destitutes:

Coding and sounds - Lewis harris

Sprites - Charlie Forster & Chris Jackson

Music - OpengameArt
